name: Cube War (Freakout Games)
description:
A prototype where the objective for the player is to control the cube, stay away from "Black" cube and reach the colored destination points in sequential order.

It's challenging as you need to really Explore to reach each destination!!

The color pattern is generated randomly and the game has 5 unlockables.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The mechanics is simple, the player just need to control the "White" cube using movement keys as mentioned below

Controls:

Movement: A, W, S, D or Arrow Keys

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Twitter: https://twitter.com/freakoutgames
